name: Climate Change And The Angry Fish!
name_original: Climate Change And The Angry Fish!
description:
This was Made for the COP26 Game Jam that took Place over 2 days, this was my most difficult jam yet and wasn't able to add alot of the things i wanted, It has alot of bugs that i didn't know where there and i wasn't able to play test the last build so it is compltly broken. 

The game is set in the future where Plastics in oceans are higher than ever and it producing more green house gases than ever(this will be seen with the dense fog), This is a problem for 2 reasons, it is more difficuly to see in the bad atmosphere and that the fish in the ocean have evolved to survive the plastic by  coming to land and hunting humans. 

The objective for the player is to stop the fish from destroying the islands community centere which has lots of humans within it. If the fish get in, it will mean the end for this small town.

There are 2 more buildings on the islands to get health and ammo for the player to continue the defense.

The Controls for the Game: 

- W,A,S,D To move

- Mouse To Look Around

- Left Click To Shoot

-Left Shift To sprint
